name: Cargo Rats
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 46.
Guide a group of cargo rats out of a sinking ship. Avoid traps, push crates, and race the rising water.

Controls

Move with the arrow keys or WASD. Hold SHIFT to pull objects.

Credits

Braden Emerson
Jennifer Gu

Fonts by Chevy Ray
